# The `TypedInit` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is the common superclass of types that have a specific, explicit type, stored in ValueTy. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::TypedInit</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This is the common superclass of types that have a specific, explicit type, stored in ValueTy.

## Public Member Functions

### convertInitializerBitRange() {#a60ed010e5b9fd39c0775648ac9198887}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const Init &#42; TypedInit::convertInitializerBitRange (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; unsigned &gt; Bits) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This function is used to implement the bit range selection operator.

Given a value, it selects the specified bits, returning them as a new <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/init">Init</a></code> of type <code>bits</code>. If it is not legal to use the bit selection operator on this value, null is returned.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h/#l00442">442</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h">Record.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/record-cpp/#l02224">2224</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/record-cpp">Record.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### convertInitializerTo() {#ac19efdca0970a26cd20c2130876ad6a7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const Init &#42; TypedInit::convertInitializerTo (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recty">RecTy</a> &#42; Ty) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Convert to a value whose type is <code>Ty</code>, or return null if this is not possible.

This can happen if the value&#39;s type is convertible to <code>Ty</code>, but there are unresolved references.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h/#l00439">439</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h">Record.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/record-cpp/#l02212">2212</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/record-cpp">Record.cpp</a>.

### getCastTo() {#abfdfeb6e9f368848e73a8eba175a99fb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const Init &#42; TypedInit::getCastTo (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recty">RecTy</a> &#42; Ty) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
If this value is convertible to type <code>Ty</code>, return a value whose type is <code>Ty</code>, generating a !cast operation if required.

Otherwise, return null.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h/#l00438">438</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h">Record.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/record-cpp/#l02240">2240</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/record-cpp">Record.cpp</a>.

This method is used to implement the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fieldinit">FieldInit</a> class.
